name: To the Moon, Too!
summary:
*Spoilers!*

To the Moon, too! is a short comic following the Platypus (Platplat) & Paper Rabbit as they attempt to reunite with Johnny & River after they parted at the end of To the Moon.
info:
• 作者: Kan Gao、Sarah N. Ollerhead、the Freebird Community
  • 出版社: Freebird Games
  • 价格: ¥6(Steam)/免费(Website)/$12.99(实体)
  • 发售日: 2015-11-28
  • 页数: 23
  • 作画: Sarah N. Ollerhead
  • 网站: https://freebirdgames.com/to-the-moon-too_comic/
